items.summary: Completely overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact V26 “QUANTUM REALITY” code provided by the user, treating it as the full app UI implementation.

Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V26 overwrite by applying only minimal mechanical fixes required for this repository (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, undefined identifiers, invalid JSX), without changing the intended UI layout, styling, copy, or interaction behavior of the provided V26 code.

Implement/verify the V26 “Singularity Entry” experience: a black entry screen with a pulsing orb that requires a sustained press (mouse or touch) to enter, and triggers an “aspiration” transition when entry completes.
Implement/verify the V26 “Hyper-Reality Feed” behavior: salons render as full-screen windows, scrolling between them uses spring-like motion, and images subtly zoom in response to scroll progression.

Implement/verify the V26 HUD (Heads-Up Display) overlays: floating bio/price/contact surfaces are presented as frosted-glass panels and visually react on hover (desktop) while remaining usable on touch devices.

Implement/verify the V26 Architect Mode (Creator) requirements: cyber-futuristic creator UI with a real-time revenue simulator that increases as services are added, and a “Dimension” switch to instantly toggle Setup ↔ Preview.
